page.title: 09Industry-Continued.
page.content: Farmers order their barns to suit their needs.The prepared materials are taken to the site.For erecting they use a digger,ready-mix cement lorry, transporter,crane and a small van.It takes 2 days to fabricate and 3 days to erect. The largest barn erected was 220ft. long and 80ft. wide but normally,they are about 60ft.x 40ft. The firm works within a 60 mile radius and builds about 60 barns in a year. They advertise by placing their name- plate above each completed barn. They also repair farm machinery and make steel gates and doors. It is interesting to note that the business is run by 3 brothers on the same spot as their father's forge. This is the only heavy industry in this area.
